snippet: In Spring Valley, N.Y., Mayor Noramie F. Jasmin and her deputy, Joseph A. Desmaret, were charged in a bribery scheme over a proposed community center.
abstract: Spring Valley, NY, Mayor Noramie F Jasmin and deputy Joseph A Desmaret are arrested and charged in wide-ranging bribery scheme that also ensnared State Sen Malcolm A Smith, City Councilman Daniel J Halloran III, and two others; federal authorities say Jasmin had approved sale of a property in exchange for becoming secret part-owner in company that bought land.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and RANDY LEONARD

lead_paragraph: In Spring Valley, N.Y., Mayor Noramie F. Jasmin and her deputy, Joseph A. Desmaret, were charged in a bribery scheme over a proposed community center.

headline.seo: Bribery Accusations Reach a Village’s Main Street
headline.main: Accusations of Bribery Hit a Village’s Main Street
headline.print_headline: Accusations of Bribery Hit a Village’s Main Street
